following signs and symptoms are present.
/circle6 Fever (temperature >38°C or > 100.5°F)
/circle6 Lower abdominal pain and tenderness
/circle6 Abnormal and foul-smelling lochia, may be blood-stained
/circle6 Burning micturition
/circle6 Uterus not well contracted
/circle6 Feeling of weakness
/circle6 Vaginal bleeding
